version_description:
– Added translations for 11 new languages
– Added a bunch of new items
– Fixed various bugs and increased performance

– Added an option to restart the game (from the settings menu)
– Added lots of new items to merge
– Changed graphics for some items
– Added notifications about important events
– Added new ad offers
– Containers now show items that can drop from them
– Items in bubbles can now be moved

– Added dozens of new tasks
– Added an option to restart the game (from the settings menu)
– Added lots of new items to merge
– Changed graphics for some items
– Added notifications about important events
– Added new ad offers
– Containers now show items that can drop from them
– Items in bubbles can now be moved

– Added new item chains with 50 new items
– Fixed various errors

– Added options to get coins, crystals, and items for watching ads.
– Fixed some errors related to ads.
